thread.title: BRIEF-Consolidated Container Company To Acquire Polycycle Solutions Assets From DS Services

title: BRIEF-Consolidated Container Company To Acquire Polycycle Solutions Assets From DS Services

organizations.name: brief-consolidated container company to acquire polycycle solutions
brief-consolidated container company to acquire pol
ycycle solutions assets from ds services reuters

text:
April 9, 2018 / 4:20 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Consolidated Container Company To Acquire Polycycle Solutions Assets From DS Services Reuters Staff 
April 9 (Reuters) - CONSOLIDATED CONTAINER COMPANY : 
* CONSOLIDATED CONTAINER COMPANY TO ACQUIRE POLYCYCLE SOLUTIONS ASSETS FROM DS SERVICES 
* CONSOLIDATED CONTAINER COMPANY SAYS HAS ACQUIRED ASSETS OF POLYCYCLE SOLUTIONS FROM DS SERVICES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
